  • Classes in com.tloj.game.rooms used by com.tloj.game.game
    Class
    Description
    BossRoom
    Represents a room in the game that contains a boss.
    EndRoom
    Represents the end room in the game.
    This room marks the end of the game.
    HealingRoom
    Class that represents a healing room in the game.
    It is situated between each floor and allows the player to heal completely and meet some FriendlyEntity.
    You can also buy items from Merchant or upgrade your weapon from a Smith
    HostileRoom
    Class that represents a hostile room in the game
    Contains the mobs of the room
    Inherits from the Room class.
    LootRoom
    Class that represents a loot room in the game.
    Room
    Abstract class that represents a room in the game
    StartRoom
    Represents the starting room in the game.
    This room is always visited since the game starts here.
    TrapRoom
    Represents a trap room in the game.
